name: Wei Wang 0050
content: Wei Wang's Homepage Wei Wang (王巍) Professor, Ph.D Advisor (教授、博导) School of Computer Science Wuhan University （武汉大学计算机学院） Office: Room B404, Leijun Technology Building, Wuhan University (雷军科技楼) Email: wangw@whu.edu.cn Wei Wang is a professor in School of Computer Science, Wuhan University. During Jun. 2019 to Aug. 2019, he was a Visiting Scholar in Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering University of California San Diego. He received his Ph.D. degree in Department of Computer Science and Engineering from Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), where his Ph.D. advisor is Prof. Qian Zhang. Before he joined HKUST, he received his bachelor degree in Electronics and Information Engineering from Huazhong University of Science& Technology in June 2010. 长期招收：博士后、全日制工学博士、全日制工程博士、非全日制工程博士、学术硕士、工程硕士、本科生实习 欢迎有意到武汉大学计算机学院直接攻读博士/硕士（2024年入学）的硕士生、本科生联系本人。 欢迎本校大二、大三的有志出国/参加大创项目或科研竞赛的本科生加入本人实验室从事科研实践工作。已推荐学生去向：Cornell University、CMU、UCLA、UIUC、UMass、美国东北大学、加拿大滑铁卢大学、香港科技大学、香港中文大学 研究方向：智能无人系统与物联网 （AIoT） 机器人/无人机自主导航、多源传感器融合感知与定位 无源物联网 Looking For Students/PostDocs I am currently looking for highly motivated graduate (Ph.D. and master) and undergraduate students to work on research projects in wireless networking and mobile computing. Candidates are expected to have solid background in network/mobile systems, and strong motivation towards academic excellence. Hands-on system implementation and/or strong mathematical background is a big plus. If interested and have the right background, please email me at weiwangw@hust.edu.cn.
